{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-827 |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B005PAIZNE |price= |est_release_date=09/24/2011 |fcc_date=05/19/2011 |manuf_country= |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR827MO1 |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP8000AU |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0,SD Card,Mini PCIe |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=D-Link DIR-827MO1 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9382 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=D-Link DIR-827MO1 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9382 |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=84:C9:B2 |oui_eth=84:C9:B2 |default_ch= }} ''HD Media Router 2000''
[http://amplifi.dlink.com/products/DIR-827 Product page] [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/router-charts/products/0/1107-dlink_dir827 On SmallNetBuilder's Router Charts] :[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31641-d-link-dir-827-hd-media-router-2000-reviewed Reviewed on SmallNetBuilder] :84:C9:B2 OUI in the screenshots of the SmallNetBuilder review There is a '''Pericom''' PI7C9X20303SL PCIe packet switch on the wireless module board.
